name: WPxon Ajax Contact Form
author: WPxon

sections.description:
Ajax contact form is a simple and clean deisnged contact form. You will be publishing your Ajax Contact Form plugin with just a few steps.

Demo

http://wpxon.com/ajcf/

Features

  • Fully responsive and mobile ready.
  • Strong Options Panel.
  • Easy Shortcode
  • Easy Installation.
  • Translation ready
  • Easy to use and customize

Uses

There are 2 ways to publish Ajax Contact Form anywhere in the posts or pages with the following shortcodes:

In posts or pages editor :-

[ajax_contact_form]

In php file:-

<?php echo do_shortcode('[ajax_contact_form]'); ?>

If you prefer, start a private support ticket at support.wpxon.com.
Also if you want to customize according to you just let us know and buy a coffee for us. We are happy to assists you.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for “WPxon Ajax Contact Form”.
  3. Click “Install Now”.

OR

  1. Download the zip file.
  2. Upload the zip file via Plugins > Add New > Upload.

Activate the plugin. Look for “Ajax Contact Form” in the admin menu.
